casebody.data:
HOUSE OF RAEFORD FARMS, INC.
v.
NORTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES. No. 301P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. Anita LeVeaux, Assistant Attorney General, for North Carolina Department of Environment And Natural Resources. Henry W. Jones, Jr., Raleigh, for House of Raeford Farms, Inc. Lori P. Jones, Raleigh, for House of Raeford Farms, Inc. Mary Louise Lucasse, Special Deputy Attorney General, for North Carolina Department of Environment And Natural Resources.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Respondent on the 25th of August 2015 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th of August 2015 by Respondent in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
